name: Brick Breaker!
description:
"Brick Breaker!" is simple remake of the classic game Breakout, made in DragonRuby.

This game was made as part of Doctor Joshua's Mini Game Collection, and was developed to help learn the ins and outs of the DragonRuby game engine.

Control the paddle at the bottom of the screen using the arrow keys, and start and pause the game using the space bar.
